title: Time Crunch: (A Chase McCord Novel, Book 2) (Chase McCord Time Series)
features: A lost boy. Eight gutsy commandos. A world filled with dinosaurs.
Chances are, no one’s making it home alive …

Fourteen-year-old Chase leads a team of commandos back to the age of dinosaurs to rescue a missing boy. The lost kid’s best friend, Chase is the one person able to step into Zach’s shoes, guess what he was thinking, and track him down again.

It’s supposed to be a quick trip. Get in, find Zach, and get back out again. But Chase already knows that nothing’s ever certain in a world filled with dinosaurs. And that when things can’t possibly get any worse … they always do.
Don’t stop running and don’t look back! Read
, Book 2 in Chase McCord’s explosive “Time” series today!
description: The best dinosaur action on the market today!
I loved this book. I had such a hard time putting it down that my husband found me reading in the middle of the night. Starting the next one in the series today." --

I really enjoyed this book. Clean language and non-stop action. Strong characters. Can't wait for the third book in the series." --
